October 21, 2018

An (early) anniversary date night to our favorite pizza in Nashville, dessert at the coffee shop by Belmont’s campus, and a killer concert by Ben Rector (and The Band Camino) at the best concert venue around: The Ryman. Happy 8 years babe. Tonight was a great way to celebrate.

Craig McClellan @craigmcclellan
